author: Financial Times
title: Just a ‘sniffle’: Brazil — once an emerging powerhouse — reels under populist president dismissive of the virus
description: Brazil has a dysfunctional federal government, with an ideologically-charged president openly opposing the strategy for fighting the disease
content:
On the Thursday before Easter, Jair Bolsonaro stopped off at a bakery near the presidential palace in Brasília. Sipping a Coca-Cola and eating a pão de queijo, Brazil’s president posed for photos with his arm around employees and supporters.
